version_description:
Thank you for playing Nuggetz! This game will always be free to play under iOS and watchOS2. If you like Nuggetz and wish to support us, please consider buying the Nuggetz Pro in-App purchase.

- Introduces NuggetzPro (in-App purchase) which removes ads from the game
- Introduces achievements which you can unlock when playing while being connected to the Apple Game Center
- Nuggetz now uses the Taptic Engine of the Apple Watch
- Nuggetz now offers 3D Touch support for directly starting a game from within the home screen of the iPhone 6S or the iPhone 6S Plus
- Fixes an issue connecting to Nuggetz on a Pebble smart watch

We want to say thank you to every single one out there playing Nuggetz and providing us with feedback. This is a rather technical release. We are currently working on bringing Nuggetz to the new Apple TV.

- The code base of Nuggetz has been updated to be compatible with the upcoming tvOS version of Nuggetz.
- We updated the support for PebbleTime Round smart watches.
- Support for iPad Pro

Thanks to all of you out there who supported us by purchasing Nuggetz Pro. We read your feedback carefully and we know that some of you are not happy with the introduction of the new game mode, while others liked it very much. This release will make the new mode optional. You can disable it on the phone as well as on the Apple Watch.

* New settings to re-enable the "colors only" mode.
* New settings to disable haptic feedback or vibration.

Please note: In order to access the settings on your Apple Watch you need to perform a force touch. The settings are not synchronized between the Apple Watch and the iOS device. Each device can be configured differently.

Long time no update. Once again thanks for playing Nuggetz. This version of Nuggetz includes:

- a little visual overhaul
- haptic feedback for iPhone 7 and iPhone 7 Plus
- additional haptic feedback for the Apple Watch

Your feedback is always welcome and we have already included many of the things you suggested to us via app store review or via email.

Thanks for playing Nuggetz! When we designed Nuggetz we wanted to create a game which was playable on the Apple Watch. We wanted Nuggetz to be your quick fix game when you are standing in line or waiting for the bus. We know, nobody wants to play games on their wrist until their arms fall off. It has been a while since we released Nuggetz as a native App for watchOS 2 and we still think Nuggetz is one of the best games to be played on the Apple Watch.
But whether you play Nuggetz on the Apple Watch or on an iPhone or iPad or even the AppleTV – Thanks for your support and your feedback!

- This update does not introduce new features but makes Nuggetz ready for iOS 11 and watchOS 4.
